Hi
I configured Heritrix 3.1 to crawl some seed urls and store some pdf
fil=
es using MirrorWriterProcessor.
It works, crawls and finds files correctly =
but when it want to save
them, some of files are not downloaded completely!=

for example it found a 9.7MB PDF file but downloaded only 2.3MB !
Is there=
 any limitation or setting that I missed?
does heritrix re-queue these part=
ially downloaded files(In my point of
view FAILED) to download (or resume) =
later?

thanks

--4-9541765408-9173662633=:8
Content-Type: text/html; charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Hi <br>I configured Heritrix 3.1 to crawl some seed urls and store some pdf=
 files using MirrorWriterProcessor. <br>It works, crawls and finds files co=
rrectly but when it want to save them, <b>some</b> of files are not downloa=
ded completely! <br>for example it found a 9.7MB PDF file but downloaded on=
ly 2.3MB !<br>Is there any limitation or setting that I missed?<br>does her=
itrix re-queue these partially downloaded files(In my point of view FAILED)=
 to download (or resume) later?  <br><br>thanks

--4-9541765408-9173662633=:8--
